name: Request Records of Complaints about Police
description: Check the online public records portal before you request a public record: https://sfdpa.nextrequest.com. They publish some reports by law. You may be able to find what you need right away.
fullDescription: Check the online public records portal before you request a public record: https://sfdpa.nextrequest.com. They publish some reports by law. You may be able to find what you need right away.
whatTheyOffer: Check the online public records portal before you request a public record: https://sfdpa.nextrequest.com. They publish some reports by law. You may be able to find what you need right away.
howToGetIt: The best way to request records is through the online public records portal.
address: 1 South Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA, 94103
